edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.ui.simple.factoryui
Interface FactoryActions.ViewBuilder

Enclosing class:
FactoryActions
static interface FactoryActions.ViewBuilder

Interface for UI data type builders. Each data type is responsible for being able to generate a UI for itself, generate a ModelRuleAction, and save and load the UI state.
